snippet: A group of writers and scholars filed a lawsuit Wednesday to stop the New York Public Library from demolishing the stacks in its flagship 42nd Street building or moving books off-site.
abstract: A group of writers and scholars filed a lawsuit Wednesday to stop the New York Public Library from demolishing the stacks in its flagship 42nd Street building or moving books off-site.

headline.main: New York Public Library Is Sued Over Book Plan
headline.print_headline: New York Public Library Is Sued Over Book Plan
